channel.title: [PI] Back to client
channel.description:
I want to make my webclient back to a client. That way the cache can be downloaded with the client folders. I prefer a webclient but my cachedownloader downloads corrupt files. So if you could either tell me how to go back to a client or how to fix the corrupt cache download that would help a lot. Thanks (:
I used LostLegacy for a base. I looked at the cachedownloader.java it doesn't look to be messed up. :\
EDIT: Never mind. Anyone who can't do this is an idiot. I just gotta reverse what it tells you to do in the making webclient tutorial. It's not too easy but I can do it if I have files for another client and go through the tutorial looking at what was changed and change it back. God how could I not thing of that when it's so obvious. -_____-

item.title: [PI] Back to client
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I want to make my webclient back to a client. That way the cache can be downloaded with the client folders. I prefer a webclient but my cachedownloader downloads corrupt files. So if you could either tell me how to go back to a client or how to fix the corrupt cache download that would help a lot. Thanks (:

I used LostLegacy for a base. I looked at the cachedownloader.java it doesn’t look to be messed up. :\

EDIT: Never mind. Anyone who can’t do this is an idiot. I just gotta reverse what it tells you to do in the making webclient tutorial. It’s not too easy but I can do it if I have files for another client and go through the tutorial looking at what was changed and change it back. God how could I not thing of that when it’s so obvious. -_____-
